snippet: Nippon Professional Baseball required each team to use a single manufacturer’s ball this season for major-league play. The results included robust numbers on the mound and a decrease in home runs.
lead_paragraph: Nippon Professional Baseball required each team to use a single manufacturer’s ball this season for major-league play. The results included robust numbers on the mound and a decrease in home runs.

headline.main: Japan’s Standardized Baseballs Are Popular With Pitchers
headline.print_headline: In Japan, One Ball, Many Ramifications
headline.seo: Japan’s Standardized Baseballs Are Popular With Pitchers
